meanings.sent1: After running errands, I had to reparking my car in a different spot.
meanings.sent2: I always reparking my bicycle when I realize I left it in the wrong place.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that I should reparking my car in reverse just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The idea of reparking my car felt like rearranging puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: I find reparking my car to be a tedious but necessary task.

meanings.definition: The act of parking a vehicle again.
meanings.sent1: Finding a reparking spot in the crowded lot was a challenge.
meanings.sent2: The reparking of the bus caused a delay in the schedule.
meanings.sent3: Witnessing the reparking of the cars was oddly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The reparking of the cars in the garage resembled a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The reparking process at the event was smooth and efficient.
